source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>(-Distressed Townsman-)Sin eaters sighted! They're coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000010_CRYSTARIUMMAN<tab>(-Habitant de Cristarium-)Les voilà<var 1D /var>! Les purgateurs arrivent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Excellent. The barrier is holding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Le mur protecteur a rempli son office.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>That's good news for the Crystarium, but what of the rest of Lakeland?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000030_ALISAIE<tab>Pour l'instant, nous devons nous assurer que tout va bien dans la cité... mais après<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyna and the city guard have taken to the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyna et ses soldats sont en train de combattre les purgateurs du côté de Grand-Lac.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thancred and the others have already joined them. Let us do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thancred et les autres les ont rejoints, et nous ferions bien d'en faire autant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>There are so many...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000060_RYNE<tab>Ils sont... si nombreux...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>Godsdammit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000070_LYNA<tab>(-Voix familière-)Haaah...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Lyna!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000080_RYNE<tab>Lyna<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000090_RYNE<tab>Ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Lyna, hold on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000100_RYNE<tab>Lyna<var 1D /var>! Tenez bon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>They...they turned on me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000110_LYNA<tab>... sur vos gardes... camarades... en monstres... dans les parages...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>(COUGHING BLOOD)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000120_THANCRED<tab>ぐはッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Thancred!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000130_RYNE<tab>Thancred<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>This...one...is mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000140_THANCRED<tab>Je t'interdis... de la toucher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>We need only hold out a little while longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000150_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Tiens bon<var 1D /var>! On y est presque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Reinforcements are coming, remember? The captain said so. We're going to be all right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000160_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Les renforts arrivent, on va s'en sortir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Run! Run, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Barrez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>The Warrior of Darkness has returned. The bloody <var 1A 02 /var>night<var 1A 01 /var> has returned! So stay with me, eh? You can't go dying now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000180_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab><var 08 E905 ((La Guerrière)) ((Le Guerrier)) /var> des Ténèbres est là. <var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> a ramené la nuit<var 1D /var>! Pour nous, la vie ne fait que commencer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Godsdammit! Please let this work, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var> let this work...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Bordel... Recule<var 1D /var>! J'te dis de reculer<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>(WHIFF GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Hum...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>No! N-No, stay back! Stay back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000210_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Oh non<var 1D /var>! Va-t'en<var 1D /var>! Dégage<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Help, help! Someone, anyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000220_CRYSTARIUMGARDYOUNG<tab>Ouaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Why did you spare <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? Why? What have I done to deserve this <var 1A 02 /var>mercy<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Qu'est-ce que je fais ici... Je sers à rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Forward! <var 1A 02 /var>Forward<var 1A 01 /var>! If you can still hold a sword, follow me! Wounded, to the rear!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000240_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>En avant<var 1D /var>! Allez<var 1D /var>!! Que ceux qui peuvent encore se battre me rejoignent<var 1D /var>! Et qu'on emmène les blessés à l'arrière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Weapons at the ready! Let's make this count!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000250_CRYSTARIUMGARDOLD<tab>Ça va aller... On vaincra<var 1D /var>! Serrez les rangs autour <var 08 E905 ((d'elle)) ((de lui)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Fight and struggle. Seek salvation by your own hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dans un monde qu'on croyait sans héros, ce combat fut d'autant plus remarquable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Though the losses be grave, endure them. Though the victories be hollow, claim them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nombreux furent les sacrifices, mais c'est cet engouement qui leur permit de survivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>Oh. I did not see you there. Is there something you need?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000280_LYNA<tab>Ah, désolée... Vous avez besoin de quelque chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous à Lyna<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>No, no, I'm fine. How are you feeling?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ça va aller<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Shouldn't you be resting? What would the guard do without their captain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vos soldats ne devraient pas vous voir comme ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Injuries are part and parcel of battle. While there's breath in my lungs, I shall see my duties done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000290_LYNA<tab>Ce genre de bataille fait toujours de nombreux blessés... Mais c'est aussi grâce à eux si nous sommes encore en vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>...Appoint another. A captain's place is with her soldiers in the field.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000300_LYNA<tab>Effectivement. Ce n'est pas le moment de se tourner les pouces...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Don't pretend you are not of the same mind. You fought well today. Saved a great many lives. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000310_LYNA<tab>Je dois vous remercier... de notre part à tous. Sans vous, les dégâts auraient été encore plus importants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Unfortunately, this war is far from over. We must replenish our ranks and shore up our defenses before they attack again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000320_LYNA<tab>Nous allons restructurer les troupes et renforcer les rangs afin de mieux endurer les assauts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>Now, if you will excuse me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000330_LYNA<tab>... Si vous voulez bien m'excuser, je vais devoir vous laisser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>(FALLING TO GROUND REAX)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000340_LYNA<tab>(Impro<var 1D /var>: petit cri douloureux de la personne qui s'effondre)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>I...am fine...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000350_LYNA<tab>Je m'en veux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Completely...and utterly...fine! Better than fine! Hale and hearty and still alive to mourn those who are not. Who I failed to protect when they needed me most.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000360_LYNA<tab>Je m'en veux... Je m'en veux tellement<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai protégé personne... Ni les autres... ni moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>We've come so far─so <var 1A 02 /var>godsdamned<var 1A 01 /var> far! I could have sworn the end was in sight. And now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000370_LYNA<tab>On était à deux doigts d'être heureux, tous ensemble...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>Now they will never see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000380_LYNA<tab>Et nos routes se séparent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Impudent worms of the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000390_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)Oyez, misérables habitants de Cristarium<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The tragedy that has befallen you is of your own making. Divine retribution for your defiance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000400_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)Moi, Vauthry, j'ai fait le chemin depuis Eulmore pour vous guider. Cette attaque n'est rien d'autre qu'un châtiment divin, qui s'est abattu sur vous en réponse à votre com<var 16 /var>por<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment idiot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)The heavens have bequeathed to you a benevolent savior─me! I offer you freedom from pain and suffering─a paradise where man and sin eater might live in peace and harmony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000410_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)J'ai été enfanté par ce monde en perdition pour porter vos derniers espoirs. J'incarne l'indéfectible alliance entre les hommes et les purgateurs. Je suis celui qui fera de cette terre un paradis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Why, already our winged brothers and sisters regard me and mine as kin, alike to them in beauty and purity!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000420_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)Car jamais les purgateurs ne s'en prendront à moi... Pour la simple et bonne raison que je n'ai commis aucun péché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)But you─you not only reject my proffered hand, but raise your own against my sin eaters. 'Tis only right that they respond in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000430_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)Regardez-vous, empêtrés dans les vôtres<var 1D /var>! Vous m'avez désobéi et vous avez chassé les purgateurs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Let this be a lesson to all those who would walk the path of sin─the wicked shall not inherit this world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000440_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Voix de Vauthry-)J'espère que cette tragédie vous aura servi de leçon. Votre petite rébellion est une abomination qui perturbe l'ordre naturel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>My friends. With your aid we have weathered a brutal assault...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci de vous être rassemblés ici aujourd'hui. Je voudrais d'abord que l'on discute de l'attaque des purgateurs qui s'est produite un peu plus tôt...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Sorry I'm late. Though I would not have been had anyone thought to notify me in advance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000460_EMETSELCH<tab>Bah quoi<var 1D /var>? Si vous ne vouliez pas que j'arrive en retard, il fallait me convoquer à votre petite réunion...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...As I was saying, it was only with your aid that we weathered this assault. Without it, the Crystarium and all who dwell here would now be gone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sans vous, je ne sais pas ce que nous serions devenus. En tant que gardien de cet endroit, je tenais à vous remercier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>For each we saved, another perished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les dégâts ont tout de même été importants...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is anything else we can do to help─anything at all─you need only ask. This is our home too, and we want nothing more than to keep it safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cristarium, c'est un peu chez nous. N'hésitez pas à nous demander de l'aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you. We are blessed to have you with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci. Vos paroles iront droit au cœur des habitants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As for the attack itself─Vauthry may call it divine retribution, but sin eaters are creatures of instinct. A coordinated assault is unprecedented.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry a qualifié cet événement de châtiment divin, mais les purgateurs agissent par instinct plus que par dessein. Difficile d'imaginer qu'ils aient sciemment cherché à nous punir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Moreover, in the absence of a Lightwarden, there should have been no compulsion for lesser sin eaters to congregate here en masse. All of which points to a single, unavoidable conclusion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000520_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>D'autant plus que la Lumière a été chassée de Grand-Lac... Ces créatures ne devraient plus tenter de s'en approcher en l'absence d'un grand purgateur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>...That these minions of light answer to a higher power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000530_URIANGER<tab>S'ils n'ont pas de volonté propre, on peut alors imaginer que quelqu'un les a guidés jusqu'ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>He who did claim kinship with them─who did boast of control, not in idleness, 'twould seem, but in earnest. Lord Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000540_URIANGER<tab>Il n'y a qu'une personne en ce monde qui en est capable, et bizarrement, elle s'en est elle-même vantée... Je veux bien entendu parler de don Vauthry.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Indeed. What I mistook for bluster was in fact the truth. The sin eaters are his to command. But if he imagines this show of force will convince us to bend the knee, he is sorely mistaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000550_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tout à fait. Voilà pourquoi Cristarium ne doit pas fléchir. Il ne faut pas tomber dans son piège.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>I take it your meeting in Eulmore did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> end well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000560_ALISAIE<tab>En parlant de ce type, comment s'est passée votre entrevue à Eulmore<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You could say that, yes. But I am wiser for the experience, nevertheless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000570_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elle n'aura pas les con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces espérées, mais elle n'a pas été inutile pour autant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It appears he has mastered a technique which allows him to enslave the minds of others. A fact I discovered when he attempted to use it on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000580_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'y ai appris que Vauthry utilisait des techniques similaires à des envoûtements. En tout cas, il m'avait invité dans l'intention de faire de moi sa marionnette.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>That would go some way towards explaining the peculiar reverence afforded him by his subjects.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous avez remarqué, vous aussi<var 1D /var>? Les Eulmoriens lui vouent une adoration sans bornes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>There may feasibly be a handful of true believers among them, I suppose, but it would not surprise me if the vast majority were in his thrall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je veux bien croire à la sincérité de certains, mais des civils pourraient être mentalement sous son emprise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Had I not anticipated his treachery, I might well have joined them. But seeing his invitation for what it was, I sent a glamour in my stead. I rather doubt such tricks will avail me a second time, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pour ma part, j'ai pu lui échapper en projetant une illusion, mais notre prochaine confrontation directe sera plus risquée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Did you have any luck tracking down the Lightwarden in Kholusia?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Et le grand purgateur de Kholusia<var 1D /var>? Des nouvelles<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sadly, I have nothing to report on that front. What of Amh Araeng?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Rien de réjouissant de ce côté-là... Et toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>After a fruitless few days scouring ruins, I resorted to asking the locals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000640_ALISAIE<tab>J'ai fait le tour d'un certain nombre de vestiges, mais je n'ai rien trouvé. Du coup, j'ai changé de stratégie et je me suis concentrée sur les habitants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>While no one I spoke to had seen any sign of the Warden, I did uncover a possible lead: an abandoned mine in western Amh Araeng. From what the Mord told me, it would be a perfect place to stay out of sight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000650_ALISAIE<tab>Je n'ai rien entendu de par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement utile, mais un Mord m'a dit que les mines abandonnées dans la partie ouest d'Amh Araeng seraient une cachette toute trouvée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>Of course, I could never hope to explore such a labyrinth quickly or safely on my own, so I returned here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000660_ALISAIE<tab>En revanche, les explorer au hasard m'aurait pris un temps fou. Du coup, j'ai préféré rentrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Even should we all join in the endeavor, an exhaustive search could take weeks─and with no guarantee of finding anything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000670_YSHTOLA<tab>Nous progressons à bon rythme, mais nous ne pouvons toujours privilégier aucune piste...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>The Wardens harbor vast reservoirs of primordial Light, do they not? Far beyond anything found in lesser sin eaters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000680_RYNE<tab>Excusez-moi... Les grands purgateurs émettent une intense lumière, c'est bien ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>And isn't it true that the Oracle could see the Light of a sin eater from malms away? Surely a Warden would seem like a blazing beacon by comparison?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000690_RYNE<tab>Si c'est le cas, la prêtresse de la Lumière pourrait peut-être les détecter. Qu'est-ce que vous en pensez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>To the real Oracle of Light, I mean. The real Minfilia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000700_RYNE<tab>Moi, je ne suis bonne à rien... mais la vraie Minfilia devrait en être capable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>If we traveled to Amh Araeng, to the south where she halted the Flood, I could summon her back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000710_RYNE<tab>Nous devrions pouvoir communiquer avec elle, si on se rend au sud d'Amh Araeng, là où elle a contenu le déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>What do you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000720_RYNE<tab>Pas vrai, Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>...Don't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000730_THANCRED<tab>Tu te trompes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>Don't what? Do what I can? What we both know is right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000740_RYNE<tab>J'ai raison, je sais que c'est possible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Do not presume to know my mind. You have no idea what you're proposing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000750_THANCRED<tab>Sais-tu vraiment ce que tu dis<var 1D /var>? Tu réalises ce que ça implique<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>But I do! I know why you never said anything. Because you thought you could keep me safe by keeping me in the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000760_RYNE<tab>Bien sûr que je le sais<var 1D /var>! Et ce n'est pas grâce à toi... Tu es bien trop prévenant pour me faire part de ce genre de problème.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>And...maybe I thought so too. But I knew, Thancred. I always knew!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000770_RYNE<tab>Sache que je ne t'ai pas suivi aveuglément. J'ai bien remarqué que ça n'allait pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, I see... I thought you were a rather underwhelming reincarnation, but it all makes sense now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000780_EMETSELCH<tab>Je comprends mieux... Voilà pourquoi je trouvais la petite un peu légère pour une réincarnation de la prêtresse de la Lumière...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>The Oracle lies dormant within you, doesn't she? But to draw on her true power, you must become one, both body and soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000790_EMETSELCH<tab>C'est parce que la vraie sommeille encore en elle. Elles ne doivent faire qu'une pour que ses pouvoirs se révèlent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>To wit, one being must consume the other. Who shall be the lucky winner?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000800_EMETSELCH<tab>En somme, il nous faut encore choisir entre l'âme de la prêtresse d'origine et celle qui habite ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment ce corps. Évincer l'une des deux, pour qu'il n'en reste qu'une... C'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>This doesn't concern you, Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000810_THANCRED<tab>Mêle-toi de tes affaires<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>But it plainly concerns you. Which is why your heart is ready to burst out of your chest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000820_EMETSELCH<tab>Rassure-toi, je m'y applique. Mais dis-moi, pour me parler ainsi, c'est que le sujet te concerne<var 1D /var>? À tes yeux, tout du moins<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Despite the raging tempest in your bosom, however, you have never once opened up to your young charge. Now why would that be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000830_EMETSELCH<tab>Si oui, peut-être aurais-tu pu prendre quelques minutes pour discuter de la situation avec cette jeune fille. Pourquoi avoir attendu le dernier moment<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Love...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000840_EMETSELCH<tab>Par affection...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, I for one think it's a marvelous idea. Certainly more promising than any of your other suggestions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000850_EMETSELCH<tab>Peu importe... La proposition de cette petite est par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment sensée. Elle a l'avantage de nous faire gagner pas mal de temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>So─it's off to Amh Araeng we go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000860_EMETSELCH<tab>Il ne nous reste plus qu'à nous rendre au sud d'Amh Araeng, à Nabaath Areng plus précisément.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>I'll meet you at the gates.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000870_THANCRED<tab>Je vais me préparer. Rendez-vous à l'entrée de la cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Take comfort in the bonds you share. Accept the pain when the time comes to part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000880_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Une route pavée de rencontres. Un chemin cadencé d'adieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Press on, for joy and sorrow walk hand in hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000890_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ils avançaient, conscients de ce qui les attendait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Beyond Mount Garik lie the Hills of Amber, beneath which run hidden veins of mineral wealth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000900_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Au-delà du col du mont Garik, les collines d'Ambre et leurs filons s'étendaient jusqu'à la cité abandonnée. Leur destination...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Or <var 1A 02 /var>ran<var 1A 01 /var>, at least. Mayhap they are spent. Or mayhap the ringing of hammers <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> yet be heard below...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000910_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Dans cette région qui débordait autrefois d'animation, seule persistait la marque indélébile des travailleurs
qui avaient contribué à son essor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000920_THAFFE<tab>Magnus's wife was a miner, you know. Greatest prospector there ever was.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000920_THAFFE<tab>La femme du chef n'était pas du genre à rester les bras croisés. Les gens l'appelaient même “la reine du coup de pioche”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000930_THAFFE<tab>When the golem hearts started failing, she was the first to head out in search of more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000930_THAFFE<tab>Quand il a fallu trouver un nouveau noyau pour le talos, elle s'est proposée pour aller l'extraire elle-même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000940_THAFFE<tab>Problem was, most of the veins ran dry ages ago, and finding fresh ones to tap's only gotten harder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000940_THAFFE<tab>Mais cet endroit n'est pas né d'hier, et nombreux sont les mineurs qui ont rêvé d'en extraire les pierres chargées d'énergie. Les filons se faisaient rares...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000950_THAFFE<tab>But she wasn't one to be deterred. She just kept digging deeper and deeper. And then the mine collapsed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000950_THAFFE<tab>Un jour qu'elle se trouvait au plus profond des tunnels, un très gros éboulement s'est produit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000960_THAFFE<tab>We labored day and night to clear away the rubble, but it took us two months to find her...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000960_THAFFE<tab>On s'y est tous mis pour extraire la coulée froide qui obstruait la galerie, mais ça nous a pris deux mois pour dégager le passage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000970_THAFFE<tab>...To find her body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000970_THAFFE<tab>Évidemment, il ne restait d'elle que son cadavre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000980_THAFFE<tab>Magnus has never been the same since.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000980_THAFFE<tab>Le chef ne s'en est toujours pas remis. Faut le comprendre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000990_THANCRED<tab>Where is he, if you don't mind my asking?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_000990_THANCRED<tab>... Et où est-il passé, d'ailleurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001000_THAFFE<tab>Ah, yes, well...if he's not here, there's only one other place he'd be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001000_THAFFE<tab>Ah, je l'ai vu partir un peu plus tôt...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001010_MAGNUS<tab>What? Oh... You again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001010_MAGNUS<tab>Quoi encore<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que tu m'veux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001020_MAGNUS<tab>How many times must I tell you─the trolley won't run! We'd be better off dismantling the damn thing and selling the parts for scrap.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001020_MAGNUS<tab>Demandez tant que vous le voudrez, le chariot bougera pas<var 1D /var>! Ce truc sert à rien, on devrait en faire un tonneau ou un seau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001030_MAGNUS<tab>Now piss off back to wherever you came from, and don't let me catch you around here again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001030_MAGNUS<tab>Pigé<var 1D /var>? Alors dégage<var 1D /var>! Et que je revoie jamais ta tête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001040_THANCRED<tab>...What were their names?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001040_THANCRED<tab>Comment ils s'appelaient<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001050_MAGNUS<tab>My son was named Skuli. My wife, Agna.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001050_MAGNUS<tab>Mon fils, c'était Skuri. Ma femme, Agna.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001060_MAGNUS<tab>Being here with them...it beats going home. Home stopped being home when I lost them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001060_MAGNUS<tab>J'ai plus de foyer, plus d'endroit où un être cher attend mon retour...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001070_MAGNUS<tab>I thought to try and drown my sorrows...but somehow...the bottle's never deep enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001070_MAGNUS<tab>Je me noie là-dedans, mais quand je crois toucher le fond, j'me rends compte qu'il y a de quoi tomber toujours plus bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001080_THANCRED<tab>No bottle is. Believe me─I know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001080_THANCRED<tab>Crois-moi, c'est quand on a le plus besoin de réconfort que cette chose-là nous aide le moins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001090_MAGNUS<tab>You've lost someone too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001090_MAGNUS<tab>Toi aussi, t'as plus de famille<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001100_THANCRED<tab>Not like you. Not my own flesh and blood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001100_THANCRED<tab>Si on veut... Je me demande si j'ai jamais réussi à en avoir une, en fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001110_THANCRED<tab>I grew up an orphan, so I never really knew what family meant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001110_THANCRED<tab>Je suis orphelin, alors j'ai du mal à comprendre le sens du mot “famille”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001120_THANCRED<tab>Not until I met a man who offered to take me in and make me his pupil. He was a kindly soul. Always looking out for me, like a father. Not that I appreciated that at the time, or anything else for that matter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001120_THANCRED<tab>Mon maître, celui qui m'a recueilli, était quelqu'un d'admirable, et à qui je tenais beaucoup. Mais pendant longtemps, je n'ai jamais eu quelqu'un que je voulais vraiment défendre de tout mon être.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001130_THANCRED<tab>But I finally had a family. And then...and then I robbed a young girl of hers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001130_THANCRED<tab>Jusqu'à ce jour-là, en tout cas, quand ma faiblesse a rendu une petite fille aussi orpheline que moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001140_THANCRED<tab>I did my best to make amends, to offer her comfort. But the more I look back on it, the more I realize just how inadequate my efforts were. I let her down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001140_THANCRED<tab>C'est pour ça que j'ai voulu la prendre sous mon aile, mais plus j'y pense et plus je me dis que je n'ai rien fait de spécial pour elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001150_THANCRED<tab>That is why I refuse to let her legacy die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001150_THANCRED<tab>C'est pour ça que je dois défendre ses convictions. Parce que c'est la preuve qu'elle a existé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001160_THANCRED<tab>In the end, all we can do is press on. For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001160_THANCRED<tab>Aujourd'hui encore, il y a quelqu'un que je veux protéger. Car si je ne fais rien, c'est son avenir qui sera compromis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001170_THANCRED<tab>And that requires your Talos. Please, Magnus. You are our only hope of reaching Nabaath Areng.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001170_THANCRED<tab>Voilà pourquoi je dois me rendre à Nabaath Areng. Et pour ça, j'ai besoin que tu fasses bouger le chariot quand le talos sera réparé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001180_MAGNUS<tab>...What rubbish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001180_MAGNUS<tab>... En serez-vous seulement capables<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001190_RYNE<tab>She's not gone. No matter what you say or believe, she's not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001190_RYNE<tab>Pourquoi tu parles de ta Minfilia comme si elle appartenait au passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001200_RYNE<tab>We can still bring her back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001200_RYNE<tab>Tu peux encore la retrouver<var 1D /var>! C'est pour ça que j'ai voulu venir ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001210_THANCRED<tab>You may not remember this about our Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001210_THANCRED<tab>Je ne sais pas si vous en aviez déjà entendu parler...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001220_THANCRED<tab>But prior to founding the Path of the Twelve, long before the Scions, she was something of a miner.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001220_THANCRED<tab>La Minfilia de notre monde avait choisi la profession de mineur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001230_THANCRED<tab>After her father died, F'lhaminn took her in and taught her the trade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001230_THANCRED<tab>Après la disparition de son père, F'lhaminn l'a recueillie et élevée comme sa fille. Ça, vous le saviez sans doute déjà...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001240_THANCRED<tab>I think they were both seeking to fill the void left by a loved one. Maybe that's why she took to it so readily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001240_THANCRED<tab>Mais F'lhaminn avait perdu celui qu'elle aimait et n'avait personne vers qui se tourner... Minfilia voulait l'aider comme elle pouvait, alors elle a donné ses premiers coups de pioche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001250_THANCRED<tab>Back in those days, I spent most of my time in the Quicksand or some other tavern, loosening tongues and gathering secrets. Occasionally, I'd catch a glimpse of her in the street, on her way home after another hard day's work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001250_THANCRED<tab>Je m'en souviens comme si c'était hier. J'allais boire dans les tavernes uldiennes pour me mettre au courant des dernières rumeurs, et je la voyais passer dehors, le visage sale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001260_THANCRED<tab>I always felt a wave of relief when I saw she'd come back safe...along with a pang of guilt at the fact I wasn't there to support her as I should've been.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001260_THANCRED<tab>Ça me soulageait de me dire que sa journée était enfin terminée, même si sa situation me mettait mal à l'aise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001270_THANCRED<tab>Simply speaking with her more than once in a blue moon would've been a good start, but I could never bring myself to do it. Instead, I threw myself into my “work” and became every drunkard's best friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001270_THANCRED<tab>Enfin, j'étais trop occupé pour aller lui parler. Du coup, je restais là, à trinquer avec mes voisins de tablée pour les faire parler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous à Thancred<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't imagine she thought too highly of you back then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Et elle, qu'est-ce qu'elle pensait de cette vie à boire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not your finest hour, to say the least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quel grand frère modèle...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001280_THANCRED<tab>Not too highly, no. She once called me a “wine-sodden wharf rat”─which wouldn't have been half as galling had it not been so accurate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001280_THANCRED<tab>Un jour, elle m'a décoché un “J'ignorais que vagabonder au gré de ses humeurs et conter fleurette aux donzelles étaient des valeurs nobles<var 1D /var>!” Elle n'a jamais eu la langue dans sa poche...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001290_THANCRED<tab>Far from it─and F'lhaminn has never let me live it down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001290_THANCRED<tab>Je sais... Les Preux comme elle n'ont jamais manqué de me faire part de leurs critiques, aussi sévères que justifiées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001300_THANCRED<tab>But that was a lifetime ago. Here and now I have another chance to do things right, and I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> squander it again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001300_THANCRED<tab>C'est bien pour ça que je n'ai pas envie de me rater ce coup-ci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001310_GUTHJON<tab>Hey! Come and see what I've found! You're not going to believe this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001310_GUTHJON<tab>Hé<var 1D /var>! Venez un peu par là<var 1D /var>! Faut que vous voyiez ça, ça va vous en boucher un coin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001320_THANCRED<tab>Tell me it's leonine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001320_THANCRED<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'il y a<var 1D /var>? Un œil de lion<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001330_GUTHJON<tab>It is, at that! You lot were born lucky.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001330_GUTHJON<tab>Si on veut... Et on peut dire que vous, vous avez une sacrée chance de cocu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001340_GUTHJON<tab>It's mostly broken pieces─but look at this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001340_GUTHJON<tab>Ce sont les morceaux d'une gemme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001350_THANCRED<tab>This is a rather fine specimen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001350_THANCRED<tab>C'est un œil de lion, ça aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001360_GUTHJON<tab>It's been decades since we've found anything approaching this big! But that's not all─there's an engraving on it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001360_GUTHJON<tab>Des gros comme ça, j'en ai pas vu depuis des décennies. En plus, y a comme des lettres gravées dessus...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001370_THANCRED<tab>Ah, these scratches here? They're a little hard to make out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001370_THANCRED<tab>Ces lignes, là, qui ressemblent à des rayures<var 1D /var>? C'est vrai qu'on pourrait aussi y voir des lettres... Hum...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001380_THANCRED<tab>"To my beloved Magnus and Skuli.“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001380_THANCRED<tab>“À Magnus et Skuri, les amours de ma vie”...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001390_GUTHJON<tab>Yes! Do you see!? It was a gift to Magnus from his wife!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001390_GUTHJON<tab>J'en étais sûr<var 1D /var>! C'est le cadeau d'Agna, la femme de Magnus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001400_GUTHJON<tab>She found it. She <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> found it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001400_GUTHJON<tab>Un cadeau à la hauteur de la reine du coup de pioche... Elle avait bien trouvé la pierre qu'elle cherchait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001410_GUTHJON<tab>She must've spent her final hours carving this message into the stone, in the hope that he might see it one day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001410_GUTHJON<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, l'éboulement l'a empêchée de rejoindre les siens. Elle a dû graver ce message avant de rendre son dernier souffle, convaincue qu'il parviendrait un jour à Magnus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001420_GUTHJON<tab>Those rock-backed bastards must've made off with it before we could clear a path to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001420_GUTHJON<tab>Les sales bêtes qui vivent dans le coin ont trouvé la pierre avant nous et l'ont emportée jusqu'ici. Pfff... quel dommage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001430_GUTHJON<tab>It's fate that brought you here to find this stone. No other explanation. Makes me wonder what else might still be buried in these parts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001430_GUTHJON<tab>Vous avez déterré un testament enfoui... Qui aurait pu se douter qu'un tel témoignage sommeillait ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001440_URIANGER<tab>Preparations for the enchantment are complete. When the heart hath been suffused with a sufficient quantity of aether, the golem should be restored to life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001440_URIANGER<tab>Et voilà... On devrait pouvoir relancer le talos en utilisant l'énergie magique prévue à cet effet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001450_THAFFE<tab>All right then. Whenever you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001450_THAFFE<tab>Compris<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001460_THAFFE<tab>It's working! It's working!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001460_THAFFE<tab>Le talos s'est mis en marche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001470_THAFFE<tab>M...Magnus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001470_THAFFE<tab>Euh... Chef...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001480_MAGNUS<tab>You left me for this...this wretched heap of stone and rubble...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001480_MAGNUS<tab>... Qu'est-ce qui m'arrive<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi ce tas de cailloux me fait cet effet-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001490_MAGNUS<tab>This worthless pile of earth. And yet...I can't... I can't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001490_MAGNUS<tab>C'est tout ce que tu me laisses<var 1D /var>? Et pourtant... Et pourtant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001500_URIANGER<tab>What troubleth thee, child?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001500_URIANGER<tab>Qu'y a-t-il, Minfilia<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001510_RYNE<tab>I shouldn't be here. I don't deserve to be. I don't deserve any of the things you've done for me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001510_RYNE<tab>Je me disais juste que... je n'ai rien à laisser derrière moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001520_RYNE<tab>I'm just a burden, helpless and hopeless. If tomorrow came and I was gone, it would be better for everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001520_RYNE<tab>J'ai beau essayer, je ne vous arrive pas à la cheville... Et si je décide de vivre, personne ne s'en réjouira.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001530_RYNE<tab>Thancred most of all. He'll never admit it, but I can see it in his eyes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001530_RYNE<tab>Ça ferait même de la peine à Thancred, en fait... Alors que ça pourrait être plus simple...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001540_RYNE<tab>I wish he'd just say it─just say that he hates me! That he wishes I was dead so that she could return...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001540_RYNE<tab>Il suffirait qu'il me demande de laisser place à la vraie Minfilia<var 1D /var>! Ça serait moins pénible...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001550_URIANGER<tab>None of this is thy doing, child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001550_URIANGER<tab>Si tu savais combien je suis désolé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001560_URIANGER<tab>'Twas <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who set the Oracle on her path unto the First. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who condemned you all to suffer these torments. 'Tis my sin alone, and one that will haunt me unto my dying day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001560_URIANGER<tab>C'est moi qui ai envoyé la prêtresse de la Lumière dans ton monde... Je vous dois des excuses, à toi et à Thancred.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001570_URIANGER<tab>Yet I dare not dwell overlong on my many regrets, for the world is a tapestry of fates, interwoven and inseparable, and we who strive to better it cannot choose but make difficult decisions. For naught of worth was ever achieved without sacrifice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001570_URIANGER<tab>Le monde est si complexe... La réalisation d'un souhait aussi humble que la survie d'une personne peut parfois demander le sacrifice d'une autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001580_URIANGER<tab>And thus must man ever struggle to weigh life against loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001580_URIANGER<tab>C'est peut-être pour ça que certains finissent par se demander si la vie vaut la peine d'être vécue, et d'autres... si la mort ne serait pas une meilleure solution...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001590_URIANGER<tab>The one for whom thou mournest beareth no grudge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001590_URIANGER<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, tout n'est pas toujours aussi compliqué.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001600_URIANGER<tab>Were she here, she would not suffer thee to languish in sorrow. She would tell thee to seek thine own path, thine own purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001600_URIANGER<tab>Je veux simplement que tu avances vers ton avenir, comme j'aurais aimé qu'elle puisse le faire. Il n'y a rien que je souhaite davantage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001610_URIANGER<tab>It is a truth which I myself was slow to learn. Yet a truth it remaineth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001610_URIANGER<tab>Je n'ai jamais été très doué pour vivre en société. J'ai mis du temps à réaliser ce que je voulais vraiment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001620_URIANGER<tab>Thou needst but have faith. Have faith and all will be well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001620_URIANGER<tab>Aie confiance... Je suis sûr que tout ira bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Go to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Vous devriez les rejoindre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Have you no words for her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il y a des choses qu'il ne faut pas taire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001630_THANCRED<tab>Not today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001630_THANCRED<tab>Oui, peut-être...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001635_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Crystarium...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001635_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, à L'Observatoire

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To what do I owe the pleasure that is your extended stay?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu ne les as pas collés de près, ce coup-ci<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001650_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, to the tediousness of our heroes' present endeavors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001650_EMETSELCH<tab>Pas cette fois, non. J'ai plus ou moins saisi la situation quand j'étais à Rak'tika. J'irai les voir de temps en temps pour savoir si les choses ont évolué.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001660_EMETSELCH<tab>That, and the insufferable abundance of Light in Amh Araeng. I should be glad to keep my distance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001660_EMETSELCH<tab>De toute façon, la Lumière est trop forte en Amh Araeng. Les accompagner là-bas<var 1D /var>? Très peu pour moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001670_EMETSELCH<tab>I'm rather fond of sleep, you know. Wonderful way to pass the time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001670_EMETSELCH<tab>Du coup, j'en ai profité pour faire une sieste. C'est tellement agréable de se reposer... Je ne connais pas de meilleure façon de passer le temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001680_EMETSELCH<tab>Not that my compeers would agree, mind you. Always on the move, the lot of them. Like Lahabrea, constantly jumping from vessel to vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001680_EMETSELCH<tab>Ce vieux Lahabrea changeait d'enveloppe en permanence et courait à droite à gauche... Comme ça devait être usant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001690_EMETSELCH<tab>Such fire, such determination! So much passion, fleeting and forgotten...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001690_EMETSELCH<tab>Autant au niveau du moral que des souvenirs, sans parler des espoirs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001700_EMETSELCH<tab>Come to think of it, Exarch, I don't believe I've ever seen <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> retire to your chambers for so much as forty winks. However do you keep your eyes from closing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001700_EMETSELCH<tab>D'ailleurs, tu ne te reposes jamais, toi<var 1D /var>? Ou t'es-tu déjà trop reposé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001710_EMETSELCH<tab>The cold shoulder. You wound me, sir.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001710_EMETSELCH<tab>Je crois qu'ils me détestent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001720_EMETSELCH<tab>Always so guarded in our every interaction─interactions you curiously refrain from sharing with the Scions and their champion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001720_EMETSELCH<tab>S'ils se méfient à ce point des Asciens, pourquoi ne m'ont-ils jamais sommé de m'en aller quand je les ai approchés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for his energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing him at my enemies like a weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>C'est parce que leur héros n'est pas belliqueux. Ce n'est pas son genre de chercher l'af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à tout prix sans savoir à qui il a affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And risk souring your budding relationship? I think not. Much as I dislike you, there are more useful targets for her energies. And I am not in the habit of pointing her at my enemies like a weapon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>C'est parce que leur héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var> n'est pas belliqueu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((x)) /var>. Ce n'est pas son genre de chercher l'af<var 16 /var>fron<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à tout prix sans savoir à qui <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001750_EMETSELCH<tab>Is that right? Fond of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001750_EMETSELCH<tab>Oooh, tu as étudié le dossier<var 1D /var>! Tu parles comme si vous étiez des amis d'enfance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001760_EMETSELCH<tab>You continue to fascinate me, Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001760_EMETSELCH<tab>Tu m'intrigues, cher Exarque...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001761_EMETSELCH<tab>But tell me: who are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001761_EMETSELCH<tab>Qui es-tu réellement...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001770_EMETSELCH<tab>The once-great nation whose ingenuity gave birth to this tower was shaped by my hand. As such, I know full well the wonders it can facilitate...and those it cannot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001770_EMETSELCH<tab>J'étais dans le monde primitif aux côtés du peuple qui a bâti cette tour... J'ai joué un rôle dans la fondation et le développement de l'empire allagois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001780_EMETSELCH<tab>There is nothing in these walls which could have aided you in summoning our dear friend across time and space.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001780_EMETSELCH<tab>C'est pour ça que je le sais. L'édifice ne renferme pas la technique d'invocation que tu as utilisée pour faire venir <var 08 E905 ((cette héroïne)) ((ce héros)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001790_EMETSELCH<tab>Much less in possession of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mortal flesh! Not even <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> could have performed such a feat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001790_EMETSELCH<tab>D'ailleurs, même les Asciens ne sont pas parvenus à maîtriser ce procédé, qui consiste à attirer un être dans un autre monde sans lui faire abandonner son enveloppe charnelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I see... You had a hand in Allag as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu étais déjà là du temps d'Allag...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You would know what I am?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dans ce cas, je sais quoi te répondre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am the adjudicator of the sacred history with which you dared trifle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001820_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je ne suis qu'un assesseur guidé à la fois par l'Histoire et la ténacité des êtres humains... tout ce dont toi et les tiens vous êtes toujours joués.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am keeper of this tower's boundless wisdom. The wisdom of ages without age. Of everywhere and nowhere. The great work of those who tamed the wings of time, and grasped the nature of the rift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001830_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>La Tour de Cristal... Les ailes du temps... Ces outils créés par de lointains voyageurs ont permis d'observer le temps et l'espace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of the sacrifice of brave heroes who gave their lives for a brighter future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001840_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Les génies qui l'ont remarqué ont consacré leur vie à la transmission de leur éclat...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>'Tis a boon born of sacrifices yet unmade... The parting gift of brave heroes who will one day give their lives for a brighter future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001850_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Les génies qui le remarqueront risqueront leur vie pour nous léguer leur éclat...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will not see their hopes and dreams squandered. The history which led us here <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be unwritten. I promise you that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001860_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Et moi, je me dresse là, porteur de tous les espoirs et de tous les miracles, me rebellant contre la fatalité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, it seems we are both eager to fulfill our duties, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001870_EMETSELCH<tab>... Et tu voudrais en finir au plus vite, tout comme moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On that much we are in agreement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tout à fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001890_RYNE<tab>Urianger?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001890_RYNE<tab>Urianger...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001900_URIANGER<tab>Thou must needs carry on without me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001900_URIANGER<tab>Je reste ici. Poursuivez sans moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001910_URIANGER<tab>The path to Nabaath Areng lieth open. Whilst thou travelest thither to the south, I would apprise Mistress Alisaie and the others of our progress.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001910_URIANGER<tab>La route de Nabaath Areng est désormais praticable. Il va falloir que quelqu'un aille prévenir Alisaie et les autres. Ils sont toujours en train de faire diversion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001920_URIANGER<tab>As circumstances permit, I will thereafter rejoin the hunt for the remaining Lightwardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001920_URIANGER<tab>Nous pourrons peut-être poursuivre l'extermination des grands purgateurs, selon la tournure que prendront les événements. Nous devons être prêts à nous rassembler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001930_THANCRED<tab>Magnus. Will the gate close immediately after the trolley passes through?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001930_THANCRED<tab>Dis, la porte sur le chemin ne s'ouvre que pour laisser passer le chariot, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001940_MAGNUS<tab>No, it will stay open until someone closes it manually. Built that way to prevent any untimely accidents.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001940_MAGNUS<tab>Non, elle reste ouverte un certain temps après son passage pour éviter les accidents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001950_THANCRED<tab>Then you and the others can meet us in Nabaath Areng after giving the Eulmorans the slip.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001950_THANCRED<tab>Dans ce cas, on n'aura qu'à se retrouver à Nabaath Areng quand vous aurez semé l'armée eulmorienne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001960_RYNE<tab>Ah, Urianger...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001960_RYNE<tab>Urianger...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001970_RYNE<tab>Thank you. For everything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001970_RYNE<tab>Merci... Merci pour tout<var 1D /var>! Prenez soin de vous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001980_URIANGER<tab>Remember: thou needst but have faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001980_URIANGER<tab>Toi aussi. J'espère que nous n'aurons pas à regretter nos choix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001990_MAGNUS<tab>If you've finished with your good-byes, I suggest you grab hold of something. Be a shame if you took a tumble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_001990_MAGNUS<tab>Si vous en avez fini avec les au revoir, je mets tout ça en marche. Attention, ça va secouer un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002000_MAGNUS<tab>The tracks beyond the gate aren't in the best of shape, so the trolley can only go as far as Amh Malik.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002000_MAGNUS<tab>Prochain arrêt, Nabaath Areng et le palais d'Amh Malik<var 1D /var>! La route n'a jamais été aménagée de l'autre côté de la porte... Hésitez pas à utiliser vos pieds pour freiner ou stabiliser l'engin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002010_MAGNUS<tab>Godsspeed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002010_MAGNUS<tab>Allez, bon voyage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002020_THANCRED<tab>Ah, that must be the gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002020_THANCRED<tab>La voilà, la porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002030_THANCRED<tab>Well, so far so good...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002030_THANCRED<tab>Le mécanisme a l'air de fonctionner cor<var 16 /var>rec<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002040_THANCRED<tab>Wait...is that─ <var 1A 02 /var>Ran'jit<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002040_THANCRED<tab>... Ran'jit<var 1D /var>!? Qu'est-ce qu'il fait là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002050_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002050_RANJIT<tab>フンッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002060_THANCRED<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002060_THANCRED<tab>くっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002070_RYNE<tab>(IMPACT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002070_RYNE<tab>きゃあ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002080_THANCRED<tab>You're a stubborn old swine, aren't you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002080_THANCRED<tab>Dans le genre tenace... La dernière fois t'a pas suffi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002090_RANJIT<tab>One who has mastered Gukumatz fears not the blackest pit or the fieriest hell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002090_RANJIT<tab>L'enfer est doux pour quelqu'un comme moi. Ce n'est rien dont Gukumatz ne puisse me sortir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002100_RANJIT<tab>Your deeds in the east did not go unnoticed. Long have I lain in wait, and sure enough, you did not disappoint.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002100_RANJIT<tab>À vrai dire, c'est moi le plus surpris. Je suis venu ici quand j'ai compris que le remue-ménage à l'est était sans doute une diversion, mais je ne pensais pas tomber nez à nez avec vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002110_RANJIT<tab>Had you only sworn fealty to Lord Vauthry, you would have no cause to skulk about like frightened animals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002110_RANJIT<tab>Sales rebelles... Si vous aviez obéi à mon maître, vous ne seriez pas en train de ramper de la sorte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002120_RYNE<tab>(STRUGGLING TO RISE GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002120_RYNE<tab>く……っつう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002130_RANJIT<tab>You will remain as you are, while I dispatch these villains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002130_RANJIT<tab>Oooh... Minfilia, ma pauvre petite... Sois patiente, le temps que j'élimine cette bande de rats<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002140_RYNE<tab>No! I won't...! I won't let you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002140_RYNE<tab>Pas question<var 1D /var>! Laissez-les<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002150_RANJIT<tab>You forget to whom you speak! Who armed you? Trained you? Fought and killed a thousand sin eaters with you!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002150_RANJIT<tab>Pourquoi donc<var 1D /var>? Il y a longtemps que je t'ai recueillie et élevée. Ensemble, nous avons combattu et massacré des purgateurs par centaines... par milliers même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002160_RANJIT<tab>And when you were inevitably cut down and lay lifeless in my arms─who sought out your successor to carry on the futile struggle again and again!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002160_RANJIT<tab>Mais ça n'a rien changé... Tu es morte, encore et encore<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002170_RANJIT<tab>We seek to bring peace to what is left of this shattered land, while these mad fools would only bring further chaos down upon us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002170_RANJIT<tab>Ces vermines<var 1D /var>! Ils te forcent à poursuivre leur combat et cherchent à t'entraîner dans leur monde chaotique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002180_RANJIT<tab>Do not be deceived, child! Only by Lord Vauthry's hand will this dying world know a sliver of salvation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002180_RANJIT<tab>Je ne les laisserai pas troubler ton jugement<var 1D /var>! Le seul à pouvoir te tirer d'une éternité de douleur est mon maître<var 1D /var>! Don Vauthry<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002190_RYNE<tab>I don't know about the world...but I never asked to be saved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002190_RYNE<tab>Non, je n'ai pas besoin de son aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002200_RYNE<tab>However much it hurts, and however hard it gets, it's my life, and I want to live it on my own terms!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002200_RYNE<tab>Bien sûr que j'ai mal et que c'est dur, mais c'est la preuve que j'ai vécu et que j'ai parcouru tout ce chemin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002210_RYNE<tab>And those “mad fools” you want me to abandon? The ones I've traveled with, fought with, and may one day die with─they feel the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002210_RYNE<tab>Je me rappelle les encouragements que j'ai reçus, les paysages que j'ai admirés avec les autres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002220_RYNE<tab>So no, I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be deceived! No matter what you say, I refuse to believe it's all for nothing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002220_RYNE<tab>C'est grâce à ces souvenirs que je surmonte la peine et la douleur<var 1D /var>! Je ne m'en séparerai pour rien au monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002230_RYNE<tab>They're everything to me. All I have and all I need. And I would gladly do anything for them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002230_RYNE<tab>Je veux qu'ils comprennent combien je les aime et à quel point je leur suis re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante... quitte à y laisser la vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002240_RYNE<tab>Let us pass, or kill me. I'm not leaving here without them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002240_RYNE<tab>Je ne saisirai pas cette main que vous me tendez. Laissez-nous passer, je vous en prie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002250_RANJIT<tab>How <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> you! Very well─if you would cast your lot with villains, then you shall share their fate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002250_RANJIT<tab>Idiote<var 1D /var>! Tu t'es laissé convaincre par les rebelles... Tu mérites une punition<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002251_RANJIT<tab>(ATTACK GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002251_RANJIT<tab>ハ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002260_THANCRED<tab>I heard what you said. And I'm sorry for all the things I've left unspoken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002260_THANCRED<tab>Si tu savais comme je te comprends... J'aurais aimé te le dire plus tôt, mais je n'ai pas pu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002270_THANCRED<tab>You have to go. Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002270_THANCRED<tab>Partez, je m'occupe de lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002280_RYNE<tab>Thancred, no─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002280_RYNE<tab>Mais je...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002290_THANCRED<tab>Go! Do what you came here to do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002290_THANCRED<tab>On s'en fiche de ce qui est le mieux pour les autres. Ce qui compte, c'est ce que toi tu veux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002300_THANCRED<tab>I'll not have you waste that newfound resolve on me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002300_THANCRED<tab>Moi, je suis prêt à me mettre en quatre pour satisfaire tes désirs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002310_THANCRED<tab>I leave her in your hands. Hurry!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002310_THANCRED<tab>Je vous la confie<var 1D /var>! Emmenez-la auprès de l'autre Minfilia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002320_THANCRED<tab>Not another step! Your fight is with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002320_THANCRED<tab>Toi, tu restes là<var 1D /var>! Je ne te laisserai pas briser les rêves de celles dont j'ai fait ma sœur et ma fille. Elles sont ma seule famille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002330_RANJIT<tab>You think yourself her protector!? Hah! As if a whelp like you could be a better father to her than me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002330_RANJIT<tab>C'est d'un grotesque<var 1D /var>! Comment quelqu'un d'aussi médiocre que toi pourrait assumer le rôle d'un père<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002340_RANJIT<tab>You would have her suffer and die. I would spare her that fate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002340_RANJIT<tab>Cette petite est née sous le signe du désespoir... Sa vie n'est que souffrance...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002350_THANCRED<tab>That is not for you or anyone else to decide─ever again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002350_THANCRED<tab>Je la protégerai... tant qu'elle voudra de moi à ses côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002360_THANCRED<tab>(PANTING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002360_THANCRED<tab>Ha... Ha...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002370_THANCRED<tab>Not a single day goes by that I don't think about all that you have given me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002370_THANCRED<tab>Je n'ai jamais cessé de penser, au cours de ce voyage, à tout ce que tu as apporté dans ma vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002380_THANCRED<tab>Countless memories and moments I took for granted... Gods, you grew up so fast.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002380_THANCRED<tab>Je passais le plus clair de mon temps à ne penser qu'à moi. Et lorsque je m'en suis rendu compte, tu avais déjà bien grandi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002390_THANCRED<tab>But you had to, didn't you? For those you had lost. For those you could yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002390_THANCRED<tab>Je n'ai jamais rien oublié des moments qu'on a passés ensemble... y compris les dernières paroles que tu m'as adressées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002400_THANCRED<tab>A world teetering on the very brink of oblivion, for which you gave your everything without hesitation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002400_THANCRED<tab>“Tu m'as toujours porté tant d'affection... C'est à mon tour d'en donner autour de moi, aujourd'hui.”
Voilà ce que tu m'as dit avant de t'en aller vers ce monde lointain.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002410_THANCRED<tab>Your kindness, your compassion, your love... Then and now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002410_THANCRED<tab>Les choses auraient été plus simples si tu n'avais pas eu cette bonté d'âme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002420_THANCRED<tab>One last time, with a little help. I'm so proud to have been a part of your life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002420_THANCRED<tab>Je voudrais que ton vœu soit exaucé, rien qu'une fois... Faire mon boulot de grand frère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002430_THANCRED<tab>Oh, Minfilia...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002430_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002440_RYNE<tab>Is this─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002440_RYNE<tab>Cette sensation...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002450_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEA<tab>Run for your lives! It's the Flood! The Flood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002450_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEA<tab>Fuyez, le déluge de Lumière va s'abattre sur nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002460_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEB<tab>(SCREAMING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002460_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEB<tab>(Cri de terreur, “Ouaaaah<var 1D /var>!”)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002470_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEC<tab>The end is nigh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002470_NABAATHARENGPEOPLEC<tab>À l'aide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002480_NABAATHARENGPEOPLED<tab>Look! Th-There's somebody up there! On top of the palace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002480_NABAATHARENGPEOPLED<tab>Là-haut, au-dessus du palais<var 1D /var>! Y a quelqu'un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002490_MINFILIA<tab>(EFFORT GRUNT)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002490_MINFILIA<tab>(Gémissement douloureux. Elle tient le coup, “Guh...”)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002500_MINFILIA<tab>No. Stand back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002500_MINFILIA<tab>Arrête<var 1D /var>! Tu dois économiser tes forces<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002510_MINFILIA<tab>We shall stay the Flood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002510_MINFILIA<tab>Les miennes et celles de tes camarades devraient suffire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>But this is what I want! It's my sacrifice to make!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002520_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Moi aussi, je veux protéger ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002530_MINFILIA<tab>Your time has not yet come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002530_MINFILIA<tab>Tu as encore un rôle à jouer, tu ne peux pas disparaître<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002540_MINFILIA<tab>When all hangs in the balance, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> must give them hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002540_MINFILIA<tab>Lorsqu'il sera temps de sauver ce monde pour de bon, tu porteras à nouveau le flambeau de l'espoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002550_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Minfilia<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002560_RYNE<tab>This place...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002560_RYNE<tab>Où... Où sommes-nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002570_RYNE<tab>You... You're...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002570_RYNE<tab>C'est toi... la vraie...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002580_MINFILIA<tab>Ours is a meeting long overdue. Full glad am I that we may finally speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002580_MINFILIA<tab>Vous avez fait l'impossible pour arriver jusqu'ici. Je suis si heureuse de vous voir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's good to see you again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ça fait si longtemps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've come at Thancred's behest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est Thancred qui nous envoie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002590_MINFILIA<tab>My dear, sweet child... Yours is a burden none should ever be forced to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002590_MINFILIA<tab>Merci d'avoir porté mon âme en toi jusqu'à ce jour. Je voulais te le dire depuis si longtemps...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002600_MINFILIA<tab>Such pain and suffering you have endured, yet still you came. For this and more, I thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002600_MINFILIA<tab>Je suis désolée de t'avoir accablée du poids d'un tel destin... et je te suis re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante de ne jamais avoir baissé les bras.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002610_RYNE<tab>I've lost count of the times I've almost given up. If people hadn't helped me every step of the way, I never would have made it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002610_RYNE<tab>J'ai failli abandonner tellement souvent... C'est grâce aux autres si je m'en suis sortie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002620_MINFILIA<tab>Yet here you stand, resolved. Now...tell me your heart's desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002620_MINFILIA<tab>... Bien, dis-moi tout. Quelle est ta décision<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002630_RYNE<tab>To defeat the sin eaters, and bring this world back from the brink!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002630_RYNE<tab>Je veux terrasser les grands purgateurs et sauver ce monde avec les autres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002640_RYNE<tab>The remaining Wardens have hidden themselves from us. But with the power of the Oracle, I thought we might be able to find them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002640_RYNE<tab>Mais ces monstres se cachent... Dites-moi, est-ce que je serais capable de les trouver, si j'avais vos pouvoirs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Indeed you could. Their radiance would be unmistakable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002650_MINFILIA<tab>Certainement, car tu pourrais suivre la Lumière pour les localiser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002660_MINFILIA<tab>But know, my child, that the power you seek will come at a price.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002660_MINFILIA<tab>Mais comme tu l'as dit toi-même, cela ne serait possible que si tu disposais de mes pouvoirs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002670_MINFILIA<tab>We stand now at the crossroads. A decision must be made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002670_MINFILIA<tab>Nous nous trouvons à la croisée des chemins. Si tu veux avancer, il te faut choisir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002680_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis only natural to be afraid. To hesitate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002680_MINFILIA<tab>Il faut beaucoup de courage pour prendre une telle décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002690_MINFILIA<tab>But for your many trials, you have grown stronger and wiser. And with the love and support of those you hold dear, you have grown to love yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002690_MINFILIA<tab>Je suis persuadée que tes compagnons t'en ont énormément transmis pour que tu aies la force d'affronter ce moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002700_RYNE<tab>The Flood has washed away so much of this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002700_RYNE<tab>Il y a cent ans, le déluge de Lumière a déferlé sur ce monde et a presque tout emporté avec lui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002710_RYNE<tab>So many people and places and possibilities─and all the heroes who fought to protect them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002710_RYNE<tab>Un nombre incalculable de vies, les terres nourricières... sans parler des héros qui ont tout tenté pour les protéger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002720_RYNE<tab>Yet here the Scions are, trying so, so hard to help those few of us who remain. And seeing how tirelessly they work, how completely committed they are to the cause...I can't help but believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002720_RYNE<tab>C'est dans ce monde que j'ai fait la con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce d'autres héros venus de si loin, dans ce monde que j'ai voyagé avec eux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002730_RYNE<tab>But I want to do more than just watch and cheer. I want to make a difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002730_RYNE<tab>J'ai encore beaucoup à apprendre, alors si vous le permettez, j'aimerais continuer à les suivre et à combattre à leurs côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002740_RYNE<tab>I want to help them, like they helped me─and maybe even inspire others to do the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002740_RYNE<tab>Ça peut sembler insensé, mais je veux satisfaire les espoirs placés en moi et léguer cette force à mon tour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002750_RYNE<tab>Coming together, providing for one another─that's the only way forward I can see. Since all of our heroes are gone, we'll just have to make heroes of ourselves.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002750_RYNE<tab>Pour que de fil en aiguille, ce monde soit un jour peuplé de nombreux héros qui se battront pour un avenir radieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002760_MINFILIA<tab>'Tis a beautiful, wonderful dream. One we share.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002760_MINFILIA<tab>Quel beau rêve... J'ai souhaité la même chose, moi aussi, il y a bien longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002770_MINFILIA<tab>Though my power was all but spent in staying the Flood, I prayed this final act would give hope to those who survived.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002770_MINFILIA<tab>Je voulais que le nom de “Minfilia” soit synonyme d'espoir pour ceux qui combattent les purgateurs, qu'il guide le monde jusqu'à son salut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002780_MINFILIA<tab>That selfsame hope lives on in you. It gives me comfort to know that the future is in capable hands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002780_MINFILIA<tab>Je vois que tu as repris le flambeau... Ça suffit à me mettre du baume au cœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002790_MINFILIA<tab>If ever you should falter, remember this: no one, however powerful, is immune to the whisperings of doubt and despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002790_MINFILIA<tab>Aussi grand soit le pouvoir dont tu disposes, il ne te servira à rien si tu perds espoir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002800_MINFILIA<tab>Do not give in to them, but do not deny them either. Look instead to the light within, that you may continue to serve as a beacon to others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002800_MINFILIA<tab>Quoi qu'il advienne, ne baisse pas les bras. Tu as bon cœur et tu as su me comprendre, alors je sais que tu y arriveras.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002810_RYNE<tab>Thank you, Minfilia, for believing in us. For believing in me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002810_RYNE<tab>Merci, Minfilia. Merci de croire en moi, en nous tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002820_MINFILIA<tab>Dearest friend...no words can express my gratitude to you for keeping her safe in these tumultuous times. You are a hero to us both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002820_MINFILIA<tab>Je te suis re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante à toi aussi... Tu as été pour moi une lueur d'espoir au cœur des ténèbres les plus épaisses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002830_MINFILIA<tab>But not even the most valiant heroes can stand alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002830_MINFILIA<tab>N'oublie pas<var 1D /var>: les héros ne sont jamais seuls.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002840_MINFILIA<tab>Only <var 1A 02 /var>together<var 1A 01 /var> may you change the fate of two worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002840_MINFILIA<tab>Toi et un alter ego pouvez encore faire basculer le destin si vous œuvrez main dans la main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002850_THANCRED<tab>Ah, there you are. We were worried.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002850_THANCRED<tab>Salut<var 1D /var>! Content de voir que tout le monde est sain et sauf...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002860_ALISAIE<tab>Really? <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> wasn't the one that nearly got <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> killed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05003_002860_ALISAIE<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu racontes<var 1D /var>!? T'as vu dans quel état tu es<var 1D /var>?
